definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Chen Yuan is picked to run in the delay?
sentences.chinese: 如果陳元被選中參加接力賽怎麼辦？

sentences.english: They say I am the black sheep of the relay race .
sentences.chinese: 他們說我是接力賽的害羣之馬。

sentences.english: I was very glad when the boys won the relay race.
sentences.chinese: 男同學們贏得了接力賽跑，我非常高興。

sentences.english: Is Lewes going to enter the man's 200_metre medley relay?
sentences.chinese: 劉易斯準備參加男子200米混臺接力賽嗎？
最後，是四百米的接力賽。

sentences.english: Relay is applicable to Corporate Teams in Challenger – Whole Course only.
sentences.chinese: 接力賽只適用於參加終極全徵之機構隊伍。

sentences.english: Lay a layer of clay on the displayed layout prior to an relayr_ design.
sentences.chinese: 接力賽之前在顯現的鋪排上鋪一層黏土。

sentences.english: Can have Fan Min run to carry this one stick of Cheng relay ?
sentences.chinese: 範敏能跑好攜程接力賽的這一棒嗎？

sentences.english: The city organized a relay race to celebrate Independent Day.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市組織了一次接力賽跑來慶祝獨立日。

sentences.english: He anchored the winning team in the relay .
sentences.chinese: 他在接力賽中擔任勝利隊的最後一棒。

sentences.english: Do you know how much energy you will burn up during the relay race?
sentences.chinese: 你知道你在接力賽時會消耗多少能量嗎？

sentences.english: Yes, I should get there just in time for the women's 400m relay.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我應該能剛趕上看女子400米接力賽跑。

sentences.english: On sports day, during the relay race, you will use.
sentences.chinese: 在運動日，在一場接力賽中，你將消耗得更多。

sentences.english: Six teams competed in yesterday's relay race.
sentences.chinese: 六個隊參加了昨天的接力賽。

sentences.english: Is Lewes going to enter the man's 200-meter medley relay ?
sentences.chinese: 劉易斯準備參加男子200米混合接力賽嗎？

definition: Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
golden years (after the age of about 60)
lit. to cross five passes and slay six generals (idiom)/fig. to surmount all difficulties (on the way to success)
pinyin: guo4 wu3 guan1 zhan3 liu4 jiang4

definition: to surmount all difficulties (on the way to success) (idiom)/abbr. for 過五關斬六將|过五关斩六将[guo4 wu3 guan1 zhan3 liu4 jiang4]
Checheng township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
